using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
LL sum[100010];
LL a[100010];
LL maxn[10000];
LL b[100010];
LL n,q,ca=1;

void solve(){
char str;
getchar();
for(int i=1;i<=n;++i){
str=’\0’;
LL res;
while(str!=’ ‘ && str!=’\n’){
scanf(“%c”,&str);
if((str==’ ‘ || str==’\n’) && !a[i]){ str=’\0’;continue;}
if((str==’ ‘ || str==’\n’) && a[i])break;
sum[i]+=(str-‘0’);
res=a[i]*10+str-‘0’;
a[i]=res;
}
if(maxn[sum[i]]){
b[i]=maxn[sum[i]];
if(maxn[sum[i]]<a[i])
maxn[sum[i]]=a[i];
}else{
maxn[sum[i]]=a[i];
}
}
while(q–){
LL j;
scanf(“%lld”,&j);
if(b[j]>0 && j>0 && j<=n)
printf(“%lld\n”,b[j]);
else
printf(“-1\n”);
}
}

int main(){
LL T;
scanf(“%d”,&T);
while(T–){
memset(maxn,0,sizeof(maxn));
memset(b,0,sizeof(maxn));
memset(a,0,sizeof(maxn));
memset(sum,0,sizeof(maxn));
printf(“Case #%d:\n”,ca++);
scanf(“%lld %lld”,&n,&q);
solve();
}
return 0;
}
